citeinfo.title: Compound-specific stable isotopes of organic compounds from lake sediments track recent environmental changes in an alpine ecosystem, Rocky Mountain National Park, Colorado

descript.abstract: This document is the published result, conclusion, or progress report of research performed by the staff of the U.S. Geological Survey, Fort Collins Science Center (FORT). Information used to prepare the metadata for this document was extracted from FORT's Publications Database.
descript.purpose: To report the results of research conducted by FORT staff.
descript.supplinf: Enders, S.K, M. Pagani, S. Pantoja, J.S. Baron, A.P Wolfe, N. Pedentchouk, and L. Nunez. 2008. Compound-specific stable isotopes of organic compounds from lake sediments track recent environmental changes in an alpine ecosystem, Rocky Mountain National Park, Colorado. Limnology and Oceanography 53(4): 1468-1478.
